titleStmt.title: The Son of God walking in the fire with the servants of God in nine sermons upon Dan. III. XXV / by that precious and holy man, Mr. Timothy Armitage ... ; unto which is added another sermon preached by him upon Eccles. 9.10 at the entrance of one of the mayors there into his office.
titleStmt.author: Armitage, Timothy, d. 1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock for Henry Cripps, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
